#include<iostream>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a,b,c,d,e,f;
	int A[10];
	cin>>a;
	while(a--)
	{
		e=1;
		int min_index,min_count=INT_MAX;
		int n1=1,n2=1;
		for(b=0;b<10;b++)
		{  
           cin>>A[b];
           if(b!=0 && A[b]<min_count)
           {
           	min_count=A[b];
           	min_index=b;
           }
		}
		for(b=1;b<10;b++)
		{
           if(A[b]==0)
           {
           	e=0;
           	cout<<b<<endl;
           	break;
           }

		}
		if(e==1)
		{
				for(b=0;b<=A[0];b++)
				{
					n1=n1*10;
				}
				n2=min_index;
                for(b=0;b<min_count;b++)
                {
                	n2=n2*10+min_index;
                }
                if(n1<n2)
                {
                	cout<<n1<<endl;
                }
                if(n2<n1)
                {
                	cout<<n2<<endl;
                }
		}
	}
}
